summary: This is a little test mod that I set up with a tutorial. Fights-With-Dragons can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun - he carries a set of Falmer Armor, minus the helmet with him. He is hireable for free.
descriptionHtml: This is a little test mod that I set up with a tutorial. Fights-With-Dragons can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun - he carries a set of Falmer Armor, minus the helmet with him. He is hireable for free. I tested it, it should be clean. Screenshots incoming.
author: Leitdor
